definition: to copy a set pattern mechanically/to crib

to cover/to encase/cover/sheath/to overlap/to interleave/to model after/to copy/formula/harness/loop of rope/(fig.) to fish for/to obtain slyly/classifier for sets, collections/bend (of a river or mountain range, in place names)/tau (Greek letter Ττ)
to use/to employ/to have to/to eat or drink/expense or outlay/usefulness/hence/therefore

sentences.english: Euclidean quantum gravity applies the superposition principle to the entire universe.
sentences.chinese: 歐氏量子重力將疊加原理套用到整個宇宙。

sentences.english: Every project quantity applies to the corresponding quota of 《Unifying The Form of Basic Price in Hubei Province》.
sentences.chinese: 各項工程量套用《湖北省統一基價表》相應的定額。

sentences.english: And, to quote an old advertising adage , sex sells.
sentences.chinese: 套用一句廣告俗語，那就是“出賣色相”。

sentences.english: Do you want to apply autoformat in new slide?
sentences.chinese: 您是否要在新頁面中套用自動格式？

sentences.english: You apply that information to the element that is to be manipulated.
sentences.chinese: 您可以將該資訊套用至要處理的項目。

sentences.english: Please choose the width and height of the resulting video.
sentences.chinese: 請爲您要套用效果的影像選擇寬與高。

sentences.english: This game uses a fairly standard control scheme in smart phone racing games.
sentences.chinese: 這款遊戲套用了智能手機上競速遊戲的標準控制方式。

sentences.english: Therefore, the general principle of word order translation should not be applied mechanically to the translation of anticlimax.
sentences.chinese: 突降辭格的翻譯不能套用一般的語序翻譯原則。

sentences.english: Mouse capture is applied to a subtree of elements.
sentences.chinese: 滑鼠捕捉會套用至項目的樹狀子目錄。

sentences.english: That will apply to all the old mini-games as well.
sentences.chinese: 將套用到所有舊迷你遊戲。

sentences.english: The same might be said of the music videos born of this album.
sentences.chinese: 同樣的評價可以套用到隨這張專輯誕生的音樂錄影帶。

sentences.english: How would one determine what to map on the vertical axis of an S curve?
sentences.chinese: 如何決定要套用什麼到S曲線的縱軸上？

sentences.english: The production method and procedure of a pilot test of circulating mother liquor from the production of sodium-method bleaching powder concentrate are introduced.
sentences.chinese: 闡述了鈉法漂粉精母液套用的中試生產方法和過程。

sentences.english: In such cases, there may be no codified experience to draw upon.
sentences.chinese: 在這種情況下，也許並沒有現成的經驗可以套用。

sentences.english: Authorization rules are applied in order, from top to bottom.
sentences.chinese: 授權規則會按由上至下的順序套用。

sentences.english: That user-defined autoformat option does not exist.
sentences.chinese: 找不到用戶自定義的自動套用格式選項。

definition: to borrow sth for another use/to borrow an idea for one's own use
the attitude of mechanically borrowing (ideas etc)
appropriate to any place and any time (idiom); universally applicable/a panacea
pinyin: fang4 zhi1 si4 hai3 er2 jie1 zhun3

definition: to quote/to cite/to recommend/to appoint/(computing) reference
to take as a guiding principle (idiom)
to draw on (others' experience)/to learn from (how others do things)/lesson to be learned (by observing others)
